explanations.reason: The paper focuses on the relationship between intellectual capital (IC) and nonfinancial information (NFI), particularly related to Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) and corporate social responsibility (CSR). It uses content analysis and regression analysis to investigate the drivers of risk-related disclosure quality (RDQ) and the influence of structural capital (SC) on RDQ. The study does not involve any machine learning techniques, neural networks, or related methodologies mentioned in the provided keywords list.
